userauth.urls.app_name = 'userauth'

The following URL pattern calls the functions defined in views.py. in turn these” URL patterns are called by the project level URL file in the root directory

userauth.views module

userauth.views.authenticate_user(request)[source]

This function uses Django’s built in authentication functionality to authenticate the user name and and password from the database user object. If authentication fails, redirect back to login page. If successful, redirect to home page. q

Parameters

request – request username and password

Return type

re-request login info if none, else redirect to home page

userauth.views.signup(request)[source]
userauth.views.user_login(request)[source]

This function calls inbuilt render function requests and renders the login html with the authentication folder.
